#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Install a Virtual Machine on Your Computer
#Text=Steps
#Text=Create Space on Computer
#Text=Make enough space .
#Text=If you do n't have enough storage to install a VM machine , consider uninstalling any programs that are n't currently being used .
#Text=Having enough space on your laptop or pc will make visualBox run smoothly without any lag .
#Text=Restart the computer .
#Text=After uninstalling unused apps restart your computer .
#Text=Downloading Virtual Machine Apk
#Text=Open a web browser and go to your selected virtual machine providers website .
#Text=Search for download links .
#Text=Before installing link
#Text=ensure that the website has a secure icon on the web browser .
#Text=Ensure that a website is secure before installing anything unto your computer
#Text=Installing applications from an unsecured website might make your laptop vulnerable for hacks or trojan virus .
#Text=Follow the instructions .
#Text=If the web page is a secure process to the download link and accepts any additional instructions that come up .
#Text=If web pages are secure click on the download link and at the bottom of your laptop screen , you will see the file downloading .
#Text=Never install a file from an unsecured website , because it could make your computer vulnerable for hacks and virus
#Text=Installing a Virtual Machine
#Text=Launch the installer .
#Text=After the download completes , start the installer .
#Text=The installer will be located in the location specified when it was downloaded .
#Text=On your web browser search for downloads and you will be able to see your file .
#Text=After launching the installer , setup procedures will appear
#Text=keep clicking next on the installer .
#Text=Accept Network Interfaces .
#Text=Accept any form of network prompt that pops up .
#Text=Create icons .
#Text=Be sure to create a desktop icon and start menu icon for easy access to the virtual machine .
#Text=Allows you to easily access the applications on your home screen .
#Text=Accept any other installation and Click Finish .
#Text=Depending on your computer , you might get extra options , but after that click Finish .
#Text=Restart .
#Text=Restarting your computer will make all the changes you have made to be applied quickly
#Text=Running an Operating System on a Visual Machine
#Text=Download your Desired Operating system ISO File .
#Text=Different operating systems that could be used would be Windows , macOS , Mint , chrome os , ubuntu , arch Linux , etc.
#Text=Once Download is complete , Launch VirtualBox .
#Text=Once you have downloaded your desired operating system , Launch VirtualBox or any other virtual machine that you have chosen to run your OS on .
#Text=Once VisualBox is launched click on New .
#Text=Provide a name for the Operating system .
#Text=Choose Operating system space .
#Text=Select VirtualDisk Type .
#Text=Attach OS File to visualBox .
#Text=Click on settings and choose storage .
#Text=On Storage attach your operating system file .
#Text=Select ubuntu and Click Start .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Make sure your operating system can support the programs that you intend to install
#Text=Ensure that you have enough space on your laptop or pc to avoid storage errors while installing the virtual machine and other components
#Text=Things you 'll Need
#Text=Computer running Windows 7 , 8 , or 10
#Text=Internet Connection
#Text=Enough Storage Space
#Text=Laptop or PC
